title: "See Kenya’s wildlife in a different light: on horseback"
excerpt: "The equatorial sun is relentless, bearing down as I lead Elaine, a walnut bay with a dark mane, through thorny acacia and dense shrub. It’s been a long day in the saddle. My thighs ache and our camp beckons across a ridge of ancient folding hills in the Lolldaiga Range of northern Kenya, a mosaic of intertwined landscapes and communities."
